description: An ancient Greek breastplate, made of bronze.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A cuirass made of multiple pieces of tough leather, laced together for durable yet flexible protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An ancient Roman laminar armor, made of overlapping metal strips connected to internal leather straps.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A crude form of armor made from stacked paper and rolls of duct tape, this breastplate offers a surprising amount of protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A cuirass made from scraps of metal secured by simple strings; the loose collection of plates provides decent but not the most convenient protection.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A padded jacket with the zipper on the back used by fencers to prevent accidents.  It doesn't have any storage room, but it is very comfortable.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An armored jacket made from thick leather and metal plates.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from harm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A black jacket made from thick leather and covered with intricately carved bones.  You've never seen patterns like those before, each time you look at them you spot a new one as if they were changing on their own.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A thin, lightweight conductive vest with the zipper on the back used by fencers for electronic scoring.  Its outer layer is a woven mix of sturdy cotton and stainless steel strands.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A thin, lightweight conductive jacket used by fencers for electronic scoring.  Its outer layer is a woven mix of sturdy cotton and stainless steel strands.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Heavy plastic armor for your upper torso.  Normally worn by football players.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A lightweight, bullet resistant vest.  Suitable for wearing under clothing.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Lightweight, custom-built body armor made from Kevlar and tough fabric.  Mostly waterproof.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A suit of armor used by dirt bikers and motorcyclists.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A sturdy cotton plastron that protects much of the torso, the dominant shoulder, and underarm while fencing.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A rigid plastic plastron with molded cups to be worn by female fencers for protection while fencing.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An armored vest made from thick leather and metal plates.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from harm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
